ABOUT_GENERAL: The goal of this page is to bring Tolkienâ€™s wonderful world to life on screen. It introduces the most famous locations and kingdoms of Middle-earth to visitors through a web map application. This project is purely fan-made; all information is based on the books and the movies. I do not own any of the visual materials used. The images shown in the gallery are the property of Warner Bros. The basemap was created by kapitan_ryjek. The 3D model of the One Ring was created by berzerkey.
ABOUT_DETAILS: This project was built using Angular@21 (client-side) and NestJS@10 (server-side). Spatial data visualization is handled by MapLibre@5.15. For further details, please visit my GitHub profile.
DICUSS_INFO: Do you have any recommendation regarding the development of this web app? Did I miss some detail in the description of a location of Middle Earth? Or just wanna share something with me? Please, feel free to send me a message!
